Package com.blackrook.rookscript.compiler

Class ScriptReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blackrook.rookscript.compiler.ScriptReader
  • public final class ScriptReader
extends Object
    The main factory for reading and parsing a script file.
    Author:
    Matthew Tropiano

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static Script read​(String text,
                          ScriptHostFunctionResolver resolver)
                   throws IOException
        Reads a script from a String of text.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to read from.
        resolver - the host function resolver to use.
        Returns:
        A new Script that contains all the read object hierarchy.
        Throws:
        ScriptParseException - if one or more parse errors happen.
        IOException - if the stream can't be read.
        NullPointerException - if file is null.

                   throws IOException
        Reads a script from a String of text.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to read from.
        resolver - the host function resolver to use.
        includer - the includer to use to resolve "included" paths.
        Returns:
        A new Script that contains all the read object hierarchy.
        Throws:
        ScriptParseException - if one or more parse errors happen.
        IOException - if the stream can't be read.
        NullPointerException - if text is null.

      • read

        public static Script read​(File file,
                          ScriptHostFunctionResolver resolver)
                   throws IOException
        Reads a script from a starting text file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from.
        resolver - the host function resolver to use.
        Returns:
        A new Script that contains all the read object hierarchy.
        Throws:
        ScriptParseException - if one or more parse errors happen.
        IOException - if the stream can't be read.
        SecurityException - if a read error happens due to OS permissioning.
        NullPointerException - if file is null.
